description: Learn how to make easy meat-free nachos in only 30 minutes. They’re also budget friendly and perfect for weeknight dinners.
keywords: Nachos,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Easy Bean Nachos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 840g no added salt black beans, rinsed, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat, then cook onion, stirring, for 4 minutes or until softened. Add beans, seasoning, salsa and 2/3 cup cold water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until heated through and slightly thickened.

Arrange chips on a large shallow baking tray. Spoon bean mixture over chips, then scatter over cheese and bake for 10 minutes or until cheese is golden and has melted. Top with lettuce, tomato and coriander. Serve with sour cream.
